entries.journal_entry_description: The Rebel scum have placed antennas around Restuss, to spy on Imperial communications and coordinate their troops. Your orders are to destroy one of these antennas.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: You've been ordered to destroy one of the Rebel antennas in Restuss.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: You've successfully destroyed a Rebel antenna and should return to Captain Okto.
